reviewBody: Electronics Inventory has allowed our business to save 35% time in searching for unused inventory.

author: Safwan Higgins
reviewBody: Maintaining JIT inventory levels has been a challenge tarditionally. All of that changed when we purhcased Electronics Inventory. We have seen a cost reduction of $25,000 across our worldwide lcoations.

author: Marshall Harper
reviewBody: Having used numerous electronics inventory management systems over my many years in the trade, I was skeptical of the claims at first. After using this software for a year I can truly say that it was the best decision our company ever made. Overall revenue has increased 50% over a period of one year. Highly reccomended!
